title: New rankjed system mess up my LP gain and lost
body: Hi ever since new ranked system, i got Gold IV and lost all my previous LP. So i played a game and lost and got derank straight away and now im gaining 14LP per win and losing 23 per lose. What is going on???

replies.body: As I understand it, the difference in LP gains is essentially the system adjusting to the new tiers and less divisions. I imagine it's better to let the system adjust on it's own, short term pain for long term system health type deal. There could possibly be some issues with LP gains, but the longer it goes without an official statement of such the more I'm inclined to believe it's just an adjustment period, which is in essence what preseason is for.
